name: Pixel Duel (Spritesty)
description:
Pixel Duel is a co-op shooter, the goal is simple, eliminate your opponent!

Controls: 

-----------------------------------------

-WASD - walking movement player 1 

-Q-E - rotation of gun player 1 

-F- shoot player 1 

-----------------------------------------

-IJKL - walking movement player 2

-U-O - rotation of gun player 2

-H- shoot player 2

-----------------------------------------

Room editor controls:
0-9 - chose your object

Left click - create object

Right click - destroy object

-----------------------------------------

please leave feedback for the game, I know that the prices for weapons and skins are too much, please tell me what the prices should be for each, or even the order they should be unlocked!
